attributes.action: Offer the ability to vote against an e-petition on the number 10 website
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: If one disagrees with a petition for a particular Government policy there is no obvious way to file your opposition to the numerous signees.  In my opinion this ought to be provided.

rejection.details: Comments about the petitions system should be sent to number10@petitions.pm.gov.uk.  More generally, this issue is addressed in the e-petition FAQ - http://petitions.number10.gov.uk/faq
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
